game.name: MISADDRESSED
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: MISADDRESSED is a single-player psychological horror game where a night cleaning job in an apartment building turns into a nightmare when you realize you’ve cleaned the wrong unit.
game.shortDescriptionEn: MISADDRESSED is a single-player psychological horror game where a night cleaning job in an apartment building turns into a nightmare when you realize you’ve cleaned the wrong unit.
